experience.title: Data Analysis - Summer Intern
experience.description: Designed, implemented and deployed a system used to write and analyse production sample data for Sæplast's manufacturing plant in Dalvík.

experience.title: General Quarantine Hotel Employee
experience.description: Provided care and basic services to individuals in quarantine and isolation at multiple Red Cross run quarantine hotels.

experience.title: Pizzabaker, Waiter & Cashier
experience.description: Performed almost all possible tasks; everything from waiting tables, servicing customers and baking pizzas to prepping and cleaning.

experience.title: Work School Team Leader
experience.description: Was a primary substitute team leader, took over other team leader's groups when they got sick or went on holiday. While few or no team leaders were unavailable I worked on other projects for the municipality.

experience.title: General Employee
experience.description: Threw myself at all the tasks that needed solving; from refills in the shop, servicing customers at the register and the butcher counter to preparing hot foods.

experience.title: Factory Labourer
experience.description: Worked on manufacturing high-quality dried fish products. Was involved in the entire process; from the receipt of raw materials and products, through production to packaging and preparation of shipments.
